meanings.definition: A portion of something, especially money, that is paid or received at regular intervals.
meanings.sent1: Every month, I make an installment payment on my car loan.
meanings.sent2: She paid the last installment for her new laptop yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The installment of money for my allowance always makes me feel like a mini millionaire.
meanings.sent4: Each installment of payment brings me closer to owning my dream home.
meanings.sent5: Receiving the installment felt like a small victory in my financial journey.

meanings.definition: The act of installing or setting up something, such as equipment or software.
meanings.sent1: The installment of the new software on my computer was quick and easy.
meanings.sent2: He completed the final installment of the security system in the building.
meanings.sent3: Watching the installment of the new TV was like witnessing a magic show.
meanings.sent4: The installment of the tent at the campsite was like building a mini house.
meanings.sent5: The smooth installment of the new air conditioner made the room instantly cooler.
